detail_desc: T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons at the top and a gently rounded hem.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with short raglan sleeves, decorative gathers at the neckline and buttons down the front.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative bow and lined gusset.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave. Size 130x130 cm.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with an all-over print at the top, over the sleeves and back. Narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and an elasticated hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long cardigan in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with no buttons.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motif, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in an airy cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, a decorative bow at the front and side pockets with a pompom trim. Smocking and a small frill trim at the hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings. Two different sizes: 4 cm and 7 cm.
Trousers in soft wool twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, discreet side pockets and a jetted back pocket with a button. Low crotch and straight, wide legs with creases front and back.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Round shoulder bag in paper straw with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Size 5x18.5 cm.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide, smocked sides and medium coverage at the back.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a detachable braided imitation suede belt, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with gathered seams in the sides for a gentle draped effect and a high cut at the back.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Knee-length fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Fine-knit gloves and matching fingerless gloves containing glittery threads. Print motif that keeps its shape. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips, an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with crossover straps that can be adjusted with press-studs at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Wide elasticated, ribbed waist, patch front pockets, a back pocket and straight legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt made from airy linen jersey with dropped shoulders.

Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, concealed button placket and ties at the top. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short skirt in a textured weave with pile details. Zip in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with a contrasting colour, twisted band with tassels and a small metal decoration. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Straight-cut, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck at the front, seam at the waist and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the front and lined skirt.
Boxy-style, pleated top in shimmering metallic jersey with raw-edge short sleeves and a raw-edge hem.
Short, halterneck dress in viscose jersey. Narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a cable-knit wool and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports vest tops in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a racer back.
T-shirt in airy cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, open chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed, gently draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Joggers in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in ribbed jersey. High waist with concealed elastication. Unlined.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in imitation suede with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Height of sole approx. 3.5 cm.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets. Gently tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in softly draping silk with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless romper suit in a cotton weave with elastication at the top and on the shoulder straps. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with frilled hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length, bell-shaped skirt in wool with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Soft jersey inside.
